summary: The story of the kidnapping of newspaper heiress Patty Hearst by members of a radical guerilla organization, as seen by the F.B.I. Agent in charge of her case.
cast: Dennis Weaver|Lisa Eilbacher|David Haskell|Stephen Elliott|Dolores Sutton|Felton Perry|Tisa Farrow|Jonathan Banks|Anne De Salvo|Catherine Butterfield|Karen Landry|Nancy Wolfe|Brendan Burns|Roy Poole|Redmond Gleeson|Rosanna Arquette|Mary McCusker|Alan Fudge|Charles Shull|James Karen|Ed Ness|Richard Crystal|Richard O'Brien|Jordan Wendkos|Bruce Reed|Suzanne Kent|Peter Zapp|David Blue|Allen Case|Joe Di Reda|Paul Henry Itkin|Bob Delegall|Alva Celauro|Judith-Marie Bergan|Robert Behling|Stephen Bradley|John Alderman|Heshimu Cumbuka|Rockne Tarkington|Barbara Harris|Joseph G. Medalis|Gary Graham|Crane Jackson|Judson Pratt|Eleanor Zee|Ben Marley|Paul Lukather|Bill Deiz|James Beach|John Zaremba|Laurence Haddon|Michael Greene|Helen Funai|Robert Englund|Ric Mancini|Allan Hunt|James Curley|Stu Klitsner|Scott DeVenney|Russ Marin|Conrad Bachmann|Jack Lindine|Rusty Meyers|Judith Weston|Luther Fear|Helen Kelly
title: El caso de Patty Hearst
